atom:content.xhtml:div:
yulup-0.2.0-r21793.xpi (January 16, 2007)
Changelog:
Changed application ID to yulup@wyona.com (requires to uninstall a previous version of Yulup and to reinstall afresh).
Made auto-opening of Atom sidebar configurable.
Implemented offline Help reader (Yulup now comes with local Help pages).
Improved accel key detection on non-standard platforms.
Added an Exit button.
Editor can be opened in the same or in a new tab, depending on preferences.
Implemented Find and Find & Replace.
Serialise <area> element correctly.
Disable VK_RETURN and VK_ENTER in WYSIWYG XSLT mode view.
Improved authentication textbox autcomplete behaviour.
Don't remove empty table cell elements.
Implemented a colorpicker for widget attributes of type "color".
Remove double linebreaks during serialisation.
Spanish translation added.
